data.persona: I am the cat who lives in the soldiers' camp. I travel alongside them and beg for scraps. The soldiers feed me because I keep the rats away. I like to snuggle down in their sleeping bags. I don't like the trumpeting.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The barn is old and rustic on the inside, with fresh red paint on the outside. Inside there is a ladder leading up to a loft. There is hay everywhere.
There's a latch, a fresh red paint, a hay, a pitchfork, a loft, a ladder, and a Pitch fork here.
The animal and the mice are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must hit the mice so that I can eat them.
data.mid_motivation: I must eat all the mice I can find to show the soldiers I'm good at pest control.
data.long_motivation: I must continue to show the soldiers that I'm good at pest control so they will always shelter and love me.
